name: Thalyson A. Rodrigues
description: Web developer and lover of Software Architectures
about_me: Thalyson (talizu) Rodrigues loves to develop software, from conception, design and coding. He hates talking about himself in the third person. Graduated in Information Systems (class 2019/2) from Universidade Federal de Rondon√≥polis (former UFMT-CUR) Thalyson loves Design Patterns, OOP and Software Architectures He developed projects in his Bachelor of SI and worked as a freelancer on the Workana platform creating fullstack Web applications Talizu looks forward to his first fixed job as a Web Developer Jr, while studying technologies and Design Patterns.
